entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 30 km/h except gusting to 60 near Juan de Fuca Strait. High 9. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 30 km/h except gusting to 60 near Juan de Fuca Strait early this evening. Wind becoming light this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Saturday 1 April 2023
